CHAT.comment: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY, Petitioner v. BROTHERHOOD OF LOCOMOTIVE ENGINEERS AND TRAINMEN GENERAL COMMITTEE OF ADJUSTMENT, CENTRAL REGION.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 12:59 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF J. SCOTT BALLENGER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS H. GEOGHEGAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF J. SCOTT BALLENGER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 2:00 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
